name: get_episode_downloadable_audio
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: This endpoint fetches full details of an episode. Downloadable URL of full audio is available for **some** of the episodes.

episodeid.description: The unique identifier for the podcast episode.
